page.title: 05Village Crafts
page.content: Mrs. MacCormack and Mrs. Holt do flower arranging in Steeple Morden. Mrs. MacCormack comes to the school and does a flower arranging club on Fridays. Mrs. Holt does flower arranging for any entertainments and for the church. Mrs. Sandwell does pottery she used to come on Fridays to do pottery club,lots of children made interesting and funny things. Mrs. Bull restores furniture chairs and suites and people go to her because she makes them as good as new she puts new material and soft cushions matching the material and she does it cheaply. Mr. Lewis strips paint from old furniture and makes them look like they have just come from a Victorian house.
